full_text: The biggest benefit of being young is extremely high energy and lots of time on hand. There are only two things that you should do at that time. First is learn and build - learning new things and building new things unlocks crazy amount of skills, creativity and intelligence. Like all things, creativity and intelligence also comes with a lot of practice and as we grow up we fail to exercise those muscles and let it fade.
